body: Im sure the guy who made Game of Thrones must have lived 20 years as a dwarf hated by his father, then had a sex change in a white haired queen and was raped by dothraki, and then became a man again to fight ice wizards beyond the wall
The art doesn't have to automatically represent the artist psyche or some random truma. maybe they just want to illustrate character B getting plowed by a random clown.
maybe its a weird fetish of his, who knows lul

You sometimes gotta wonder what happened to the artist, that they became this fucked up and made all this hentai.
Maybe a childhood trauma (molesting :>) or they are just incels.
Or they just been betrayed by women too much, so they make this shit. (sorry 4 my bed english)
